extensionName.description: This extension provides comprehensive multimedia recording and screen sharing functionalities within the application.

extensionDescription.message: The Multimedia and Screen Sharing Extension is a versatile tool designed to facilitate high-quality video and audio recording, along with secure and efficient screen sharing. Ideal for professionals seeking a unified solution for presentations, collaborations, and multimedia capture, it offers intuitive controls, robust performance, and a focus on user-friendliness and security.
extensionDescription.description: A detailed overview of the extension, outlining its key features, benefits, and applications in video and audio recording as well as screen sharing.
